text: [Music]
Little Women this is a story from a
recent past the story of four sisters
Megiddo deaths and Amy they lived in a
small village in a small house their
parents were poor but the four sisters
had never demanded anything that their
parents could not fulfil meg was young
and beautiful and very wise Joe tomboy
and she wanted to become a writer then
was shy gentle and kind and Amy wasn't
the youngest one she was the prettiest
of all the sisters all of them had a
very strong bond amongst themselves all
the villagers used to admire their wise
behavior and used to call them Little
Women one day a soldier came to their
house to take their father to the army
as it was civil war going on
I have a letter for you you've been
called to surf for the army to fight
against the Civil War please get ready
the family was very sad
Oh Oh daddy please don't go
no my children I have to go it's a proud
thing to fight for your country why
don't you be back I'll be back before
the rains stop crying now make take care
of them yes Father
saying this their father left with the
soldiers few days after he left for the
war the family started suffering they
didn't have enough money to purchase the
groceries make I'm trying to work hard
so that I can earn enough money but I'm
finding it difficult don't worry mother
it's just a matter of few days
everything will be all right when father
comes back but till then we'll have to
fight I don't understand why people make
walls Oh mother one day they received a
letter from the army office saying what
is it Meg the officials have informed
that father had been badly injured
during the war
they've hospitalized him and wants
someone to be with him to take care of
him oh I'll have to go there but how can
i I need money to travel how can we
arrange it don't worry mother you start
preparing for the journey
I'll make some arrangements
Joe left the house when she returned in
the evening she had money in her hands
take this mother I guess this will be
sufficient from why did you get this
money
I sold my hair and earned this Oh Joe
you lost your beautiful hair
never mind mother but Joe we could have
thought of some other option why did you
have to don't worry they will grow again
ha ha Joe couldn't sleep that night she
was crying silently in her bed
late at night Meg put her arm on Joe's
shoulder Joe woke up to see how it was
when she saw Meg sitting beside her she
hugged Meg don't worry everything will
be alright soon after their mother left
for the hospital the sisters take care
of the house they were doing everything
in the house
okay enjoying their time one day that
fell ill she had a high fever and she
was shivering with cold all the three
sisters took good care of them but the
fever was persistent all of them were
worried we should call the doctor what
about the fees how will we pay the
doctors fee we don't have any money
I've a few cents saved they won't be
enough let it be I'll be okay soon I'll
get the doctor and his fees
let's think about Beth's treatment first
it was snowing that day Joe still rushed
through it and reached the doctor's
house she explained him the situation
doctor agreed to visit their home I've
examined her she has skaldak fever don't
worry she will be all right that's good
doctor uncle but but what actually speak
up why are you so hesitant sir we don't
have any money to pay you we're sorry
will you still treat Beth is that so
there is nothing to worry about
I'll definitely treat her that's my duty
and I'll collect my fees from your
parents when they will return the doctor
gave some medicines to Beth the sisters
took good care of that Beth was getting
a little better and started missing her
mother
I miss you mother where are you please
come home I need you please come home
please don't cry she will be back soon
you get well and we'll write a letter to
her yes yes she will come home soon at
the same moment their mother entered the
house all of them were too happy to see
her no mother
mommy mom oh my children how are you I'm
so glad to see you
best to was very happy to see her mother
don't worry dear I'll take care of now
then onwards mother took good care of
that death got better in a few days as
winter arrived meg was a little worried
about the family mother when his father
coming home here you had a severe injury
he had also broken one of his legs but
now he is out of danger and he can be
here anytime we miss him so much
I know dear I wish nobody faces such
hardships in life don't say that mother
these hard times are the best teachers
they teach us things which are useful to
be successful in the life your right leg
a few days later it was Christmas Eve
mother and BEC somehow managed to get a
Christmas tree for their house but
little Amy wanted a gift too
[Music]
I want a new dress from Santa Claus this
year I wish I find the Prince of my
dreams I want a big piano what do you
wish for Meg I wish we could all
celebrate this Christmas together
well that dear on the day of Christmas
all of them were sacked as none of their
wishes came true they were disappointed
but didn't complain about it the day was
so unfortunate that they didn't have
enough money to buy their breakfast just
then they heard a knock at the door who
could it be who is it who is it I'll
check who it is
no Amy wait the door and she saw her
father all the girls crushed it oh my
babies how I missed you this is the best
Christmas present we've ever received
thank you
having their father with them for
Christmas the family was overjoyed and
enjoyed their Christmas
[Music]
